item.title: CCPD Virtual Summer Series: RBC Bearings | May 20
item.description: The CCPD’s series of virtual summer info sessions is back! Join us this summer to learn about companies who will be offering internships and co-ops during the 2025-2026 academic year. RBC Bearings is our first employer on May 20, 2025 starting at 4:30 PM! Registration and more info in Handshake!
item.author: Students

item.title: Horses on ’86 Field! | Every Wednesday
item.description: Did we get your attention? Join us for an engaging experience with Genuine Equine! These summer weekly sessions during the Arch Summer feature Assisted Learning for Wellness in the first hour, followed by Expressive Arts in the second hour. Don’t miss out—use the QR code or use the link provided to sign up and be part of this transformative journey!
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Summer Kick-Off | Monday, May 19 | 12-2 PM
item.description: Join us for the Arch Summer Kick-Off Monday, May 19 from 12-2 PM on ’86 Field! This is a perfect opportunity to relax, connect with the community, and celebrate the start of the season together. Be sure to visit the Resource tent, where you can find student support offices and grab some free swag!
item.author: Students

item.title: An Evening with President Schmidt: Summer Arch! | June 10
item.description:
The Arch and the CCPD would like to formally invite you to An Evening with President Schmidt: Summer Arch! This event will be held on Tuesday, June 10 from 5:00-7:00 P.M. at President Schmidt’s Residence. Please RSVP on Handshake by May 27th to join us!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
